products.title: Chateau Blockout White Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their chateau blockout collection combines all of the sophisticated look of pleated blinds with the technology of blockout fabrics. It features their solar and thermal fabric technolgy meaning it both keeps your home warm in the winter and cool in the summer. Featured here in their very popular white colour - a bright tone that is a perfect neutral for any room. Product id: sdb-pfp0166 fabric colour: white material: 100% polyester headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clips control type: manual tensioned pull handle energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes chateau blockout white solar/thermal perfect fit pleated blind in white.

Made to measure from 49. 91 with free uk mainland delivery. This solar/thermal pleated blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

products.title: Lexington White Thermal Pleated Free-hanging Blind
products.description: Their lexington collection of thermal perfect fit pleated blinds is both luxurious and practical. Featuring their thermal fabric technology - these blinds keep your home warm in the winter whilst still maintaining the sophisticated look of pleated blinds. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds their lexington collection is ideal because of the celluar technology - honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit the heat transfer from your windows.
